message: I love to donate for the free theme developers rather than spending money on paid ones

That depends completely on the individual theme. There are plenty of paid themes that I like but there are plenty which I don't. I think they mix up the words 'premium' and 'paid' too much. Paid doesn't always mean premium.
I agree! I only prefer premium themes if the features in it are unique which are not available with any of the free themes like Geo-places directory,quality control etc
paid themes generally have better quality control...plus, many of the authors offer great support after purchase.

hmm... May be :)
BTW... Quality control in my last message meant to a theme name 'Quality control(getqualitycontrol.com)'
@Asshu ah, well I was referencing the overall quality of paid vs. free. for 30-40 bucks, paid is a much better option.
@Asshu Which projects have you donated to?

As much as I hate purchasing themes (rather would just design them), I find myself using them (and tweaking them) for clients who have a very low budget and when I can not justify spending a lot of time due the quick turn around time.
